  • Constructor Details

    • PetrolStation

      public PetrolStation(jfxtras.scene.control.ImageViewButton imgb)
      Default constructor for a petrol station object. Sets a default ID, name, totalFuel, PricePerLitre, sales and outOfFuel value.
      Parameters:
      imgb - ImageViewButton, in reference to its placement in the scenario on the EditorPane (The GridPane)

    • PetrolStation

      public PetrolStation(UUID uniqueID, String name, String imageURI, double totalFuel, double pricePerLitre, double sales, boolean outOfFuel)
      Constructor for statistics Can supply all PetrolStation data members as parameters.
      Parameters:
      uniqueID - UUID unique id of the petrol station
      name - name of the petrol station
      imageURI - The image URI of the ImageViewButton
      totalFuel - double value to represent the total fuel
      pricePerLitre - double value to represent the price per litre
      sales - double value to represent the sales of the petrol station
      outOfFuel - boolean value to represent the outOfFuel status of the petrol station

      totalFuel - Double value

    • reduceTotalFuel

      public void reduceTotalFuel(double val)
      This method decreases the totalFuel value by subtracting the passed in value from totalFuel. If totalFuel is less than or equal to 0 then totalFuel is set to 0 and outOfFuel becomes true.
      Parameters:
      val - Double value

    • getPricePerLitre

      public double getPricePerLitre()
      Gets the price per litre value of the petrol station
      Returns:
      Double value

    • setOutOfFuelValue

      public void setOutOfFuelValue(boolean val)
      Set the out of fuel boolean value for the petrol station
      Parameters:
      val - Boolean value, true for out of fuel, false for NOT out of fuel.
